word: SISTER WHITE FURTHER STATED THAT SHE WISHED IT DISTINCTLY UNDERSTOOD THAT WHEN SHE HAD SPOKEN ENCOURAGINGLY OF THE FOOD MANUFACTURE BY THE BRETHREN IN NASHVILLE, SHE KNEW NOTHING ABOUT THE LARGE PLANS OF THE DIXIE FOOD COMPANY. SHE SAID THAT SHE HAD ADVISED OUR PEOPLE IN EVERY SECTION OF THE COUNTRY TO EXPERIMENT WITH THE FOOD PRODUCTS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE LOCALITIES, AND HAD ENCOURAGED THEM TO MAKE HEALTHFUL FOODS FROM THESE NATURAL PRODUCTS.
